project.title: Simon game
project.intro: Train your brain with the famous Simon game!
chall: Use childNodes to point to the right elements
Math.random to pick a random element
setInterval and setTimeout to handle the sounds loop

relatedLinks.title: Tetris
relatedLinks.intro: Break lines and stay alive for as long as you can in this Tetris!
chall: Babel to translate newer JavaScript to work with older browsers
Array.forEach to loop over an array
SetInterval & clearInterval to make the game running
Keyup event to move the Tetris

relatedLinks.title: Drum machine
chall: Audio to play the music sounds
Click on tiles with keyup event
